Interface.HelpText: Armored medium tank. Armed with a single cannon, useful against lower tier units.
Hover unit equipped with engineering capabilities and a tactical missile defense installation. Can only construct offensive and defensive structures.
Uses two railguns under water to attack ships and submarines. Also carries a tactical missile defense turret.
Versatile anti-surface and anti-submarine gunship. Carries a gun and a torpedo launcher.
Assault tank, has a high movement speed and fast firing cannons.
